title: Car Color and Speeding Tickets
question_text:
It is thought that certain colors of cars receive more speeding tickets than others. The following graph shows the percent of total tickets given by police to specific car colors over a given month on a particular highway.
Which of the following is the most reasonable conclusion supported by the graph?

choices.text: Police like targeting red cars for speeding violations.
About $22$ black cars received a speeding ticket.
Police tend to ignore white cars when giving speeding tickets.
About $10$% of total tickets were given to white cars on this particular highway.
